marksAsJson.map:
(doc)->
 if doc? and doc._id? and not doc._deleted and doc.boat? and doc.boat.length? and doc.boat.length > 0
  if doc.owner? and doc.owner.length? and doc.owner.length > 0
   emit "#{doc.owner}#{doc.boat}", doc
  if doc.crew? and doc.crew.length? and doc.crew.length > 0
   for crew_member of doc.crew
    emit "#{doc.crew[crew_member]}#{doc.boat}", doc

validate_doc_update:
(newDoc,oldDoc,userCtx) ->
 if oldDoc? and not newDoc._deleted? and newDoc.owner isnt oldDoc.owner
  throw forbidden: 'old and new user dont match'
